info.brief_description: Ant-man will soon join the Marvel movie verse. Lets have some fun with him.
info.description:
So, Ant-Man will soon be added to the Marvel Movie Universe (if the rumors are real this time and not just wishful fan thinking). So, iambeowulf and myself built a new interactive in the endo style. Lets see what happens when Ant-Man uses his powers to enter the bodies of Marvel's and DC's hottest women.
To my knowledge there are around three characters who held the title of Ant-Man over the years. Hank Pym, Scott Lang and Eric O'Grady. You can use any of these three to make a story. Or if you feel so inclined you can have yourself use the Ant-Man suit for your own fun. All up to you.

Rules:

* No male giants
* Both DC and Marvel female characters are allowed, just no other universes
* Non-superpowered female characters are ok, too (ex. Mary-Jane Watson, Gwen Stacey, etc.)
* Chapters must be well-written. Any poorly written ones will be deleted.
